author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shanghai Lisheng Racing to pay 2017 dividend on May 10
text:
May 2(Reuters) - Shanghai Lisheng Racing Co Ltd
* Says it will pay a cash dividend of 2 yuan per 10 shares (before tax) and use additional paid-in capital to distribute 10 new shares for every 10 shares for 2017, to shareholders of record on May 9
* Says the companyâ€™s shares will be traded ex-right and ex-dividend on May 10 and the dividend will be paid on May 10
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/6FDkn9
